body.name: LEGO Marvel Motorcycle Chase: Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock, Buildable Toy for Kids with Stud Shooters and Web Blasters, 2 Marvel Minifigures, Super Hero Toy, Gift for Boys and Girls Aged 6 and Up, 76275
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 13 mins
features: Spider-Man motorcycle fun for kids – Boys and girls aged 6+ who like vehicles and Super Hero toys can let their imaginations race with LEGO Marvel action in Motorcycle Chase: Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock
Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock – Includes a buildable Spider-Man motorcycle with 2 stud shooters, plus 2 Marvel minifigures: Spider-Man with 2 web shooters and Doc Ock with 4 long, flexible tentacles
Easy-to-build kids’ motorcycle – Spider-Man fits onto the driver’s seat of his movable bike, and Doc Ock’s arms can hold onto accessories and the streetlight
Inspiring accessories – Fun role-play accessories included in the set are a trash can, bottle, fish, bone, banana peel and dynamite
Gift for Marvel movie lovers – This buildable Spider-Man toy is a gift idea for young Super Heroes and motorcycle fans
Expand the fun – This LEGO Marvel motorcycle building toy is compatible with other LEGO Marvel kits, sold separately
Buildable LEGO Marvel toys – The extensive range of LEGO Marvel super hero building toys is designed to deliver endless imaginative build-and-play possibilities
body.description: This supercharged set features a Venomized villain and a motorcycle-riding Spider-Man. LEGO Marvel Motorcycle Chase: Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock (76275) is a buildable Spider-Man toy with 2 Marvel minifigures included, packed with cool extras for Super Hero fans aged 6 and up. Includes LEGO Doc Ock and Spider-Man minifigures. Doc Ock features 4 long, flexible tentacles and displays the distinctive markings of Venom, who has infiltrated the villain to make him even more dastardly. The minifigures can grip onto other elements, including a streetlight, dynamite and a trash can containing a bottle, fish, bone and a banana peel. The Spider-Man motorcycle and the stud and web shooters bring high-speed action to kids’ adventures. This building toy is sure to be the perfect gift for any occasion. For added digital fun, builders can zoom in, rotate models in 3D and track their progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Web-slinging action on wheels This supercharged set features a Venomized, diamond-stealing Doc Ock and a motorcycle-riding Spider-Man.
High-speed fun with Spider-Man and Doc Ock Doc Ock’s 4 tentacles can grip on to a streetlight, dynamite and more. Spider-Man blasts studs and web from his motorcycle.

LEGO Marvel Motorcycle Chase: Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock Venomized Doc Ock Venom has entered the villain to make him even more wicked! 4 flexible tentacles Grip on to a streetlight, dynamite, trash can and more. Motorcycle weapons Fire stud and web shooters from Spider-Man’s motorcycle.
Enter a digital world of building Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.
Gift for high-speed action heroes This build-and-play set featuring Spider-Man and Venom Doc Ock is an ideal gift for vehicle-loving Marvel fans aged 6 and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money!
reviews.reviewText: Great value for money, I really enjoyed building this small set and the minifigures that came with it! If you want a fun little set to build, this is the one! Or if you just want to collect the minifigures then this is a great set to grab as it includes 2 minifigures and it's only $10! Great price point for what you get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for Lego beginners. My 7yo just started getting into legos, these smaller sets were best at first for us bc the big sets overwhelmed him and took too long for him to see results. Now he is working on bigger sets and making stuff from his imagination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That's it a good set for what it's worth
reviews.reviewText: It was great I liked it quit a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini Spiderman building kit
reviews.reviewText: This Spiderman building kit is supercute! It is an easy to assemble building kit that doubles as a fun playset when completed. The lamp post that Venom Doc Ock clings from has a trash can sitting at at the base filled with fish, bones and a banana peel. So awesome! Spiderman's motorcycle drives smoothly and has a feature on the sides that you can shoot a small leg brick out of it at Doc Ock! My daughter is enjoying playing with this set.
